scripts.build: rimraf lib && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm test && npm version patch --force
scripts.postpublish: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag sbv2-lite/v$PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags
